animeDescription: Our heroine has been kidnapped and her two somewhat ditzy friends decided to save her in a war machine they found in her house. Unfortunately they have little idea of how it works so let the random destruction begin. (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Okuwaki, Masaharu', 'Storyboard'], ['Moriguchi, Hiroko', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Tarako', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Hayashi, Yuzo', 'Theme Song Arrangement']]
